name: Twirl And Chain
description:
This game was made by only me! And for the GMTK GameJam 2021.

You have to try go through a dungeon, you and your friend the wizard (yeah I spell it wizzard in the game sorry).

But some orcs want to prevent you from it! 

Move yout mouse, to kill orcs, and avoid pikes!

The musics was made by me with https://beepbox.co/ 

All asset are free and most of them can be found here! https://0x72.itch.io/dungeontileset-ii
